#summary How to install the Subversive plugin used to download and upload code.
#labels Phase-Implementation

 * Open Eclipse
 * Go to Help->Software Updates->Available Software.
 * Click _"Add Site..."_ button and write the following location: _http://www.polarion.org/projects/subversive/download/eclipse/2.0/update-site_.
   [http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/eclipse/addSite.png]

 * Expand added site and select " Subversive SVN Connectors".
 * Expand _"Ganymede Update Site"_.
 * Expand _"Collaboration Tools"_.
 * Select "Subversive SVN Team Provider" (Incubation) and push _"Install..."_. 
   [http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/eclipse/softwareUpdates.png]

 * Accept all. The plugin should now be installed and restart eclipse.

To anonymous download of Tonatiuh code read [Anonymous_Download] or read [Upload_to_Repository] to download code and upload changes.
